data: FORGETTING PETUNIA HOLT | EVEN THE DOG THOUGHT YOU WERE A BITCH | PETUNIA HOLT | SATAN COULD BE YOUR SISTER | Palais

The smattering of movie posters that read, FORGETTING PETUNIA HOLT, EVEN THE DOG THOUGHT YOU WERE A BITCH, PETUNIA HOLT, and SATAN COULD BE YOUR SISTER are lit up in an explosion of lights from the cacophony of cameras going off like fireworks on the vertigo-inducing Palais steps, the most famous red carpet in the world.
